blog.name: batboyblog
blog.title: BatBoyBlog
blog.description: HI! this is my blog, it's dedicated to my intrests such as Politics (American, left-wing, Democrat, huge Hillary Clinton fan) Judaism (culture, religion, anti-semtism, and left wing Zionism), Comics (DC, most of all Bats) Gay stuff (LGBT rghts, culture, pretty boys) TV shows  (Please Like Me, The Crown, Stranger Things) Books (Rick Riordan, YA in general, gay YA, Half Bad, Raven Boys, Carry On) I'm sure I've forgotten stuff but that's the idea, my ask box is ALWAYS open, I love love getting messages, so don't be shy!

summary: The Marvel Family
question: The Marvel Family
answer:
Billy Batson. The Champion of the Wizard SHAZAM, 13 years old, formally homeless he’s picked up from streets by CPS and sent to a foster home. After being granted the power Billy develops limited magic outside of being the Captain. He uses a mix of his powers and a little help from Bruce Wayne to remove himself from the system and rent a small apartment which becomes the hub for the loose grouping of young heroes known as Super Sons. The Captain (Captain Thunder) is on the JSA and a reverse member of the Justice League. Often teaming with Superman, Batman (awkward) and Wonder Woman (fanboying!) 

Mary Bromfield/Batson. Billy’s 14 year old sister, given away for adoption at birth, her adoptive parents (the Bromfields) died when she was young and she ends up in Foster care system. The first of the Vasquez’s foster kids. Builds a close relationship with Billy when he first arrives at the Vazquez’s. When Billy gets his powers he first chooses to share them with Mary and Freddy Freedman, and the lighting reveals that Mary and Billy are biological siblings. Mary splits her time between the Vasquez’s and Billy’s apartment. She has a budding relationship with Freddy which Billy disapproves of. She heroes under the name Mary Marvel, a some time member of the loose female hero team Birds of Pray and a reserve member of the Teen Titans she often heroes along side Freddy, and sometimes with Billy and sometimes the 3 of them together as at the Marvels. 

Freddy Freeman. Born with cerebral palsy Freddy needs two crutches to help him walk and talks with slur to his speech. Bounced around the foster care system till eating at the Vazquez house about a year before Billy. Freddy is 13 years old and has a massive helpless crush on Mary which he was sure she couldn’t feel back due to his disability. Freddy and Billy bond nearly at once and force a close friendship thanks to Freddy’s prankster sense of humor and Billy’s willingness to help Freddy with anything without comment. When first granted powers it’s Freddy who names Mary saying she looks “Marvelous”. Freddy takes the name Captain Marvel to emulate Mary but thanks to his short height and boyish face the press takes to jokingly calling him Captain Marvel “Jr” a name he can’t shake no matter how hard he tries. Freddy is a Teen Titan and often teams up with Billy or Mary or both, and often with one or more of the Lieutenants Marvel. Freddy mostly lives with Billy in his apartment having used the same magic/Wayne help to get out of the system. 

Eugene Choi, Darla Dudley, Pedro Peña. the Vazquez’s other foster children, In his first fight with Black Adam Billy grants all of his foster siblings powers transforming them into what Freddy jokingly calls the Lieutenants Marvel. Unlike Freddy or Mary who got exact copies of Billy’s powers for unclear reasons Eugene, Darla, and Pedro ended up with versions that emphasized one of the SHAZAM powers. Eugene age 15′s powers emphasize the Wisdom of Solomon, meaning when transformed he is super smart, has limited abilities to see the future can speak any language and has limited mind control powers (he can talk people into doing things if they’re weak willed and he has enough time). Darla age 9′s powers emphasize the Speed of Mercury, which means she has near flash levels of speed both while running and while flying and can teleport short distances, never out of sight. Pedro age 16′s powers emphasize the Strength of Hercules which makes him one of the strongest beings on earth, stronger than Captain Thunder. While they each have the other SHAZAM powers these powers are lesser than they are with Billy, Mary or Freddy. the Lieutenants are only semi-active heroes, some times pairing up with Billy, Freddy or Mary, or in major crisis, otherwise it’s school and home with the Vazquez’s

Tawky Tawny. the animal familiar of the Wizard SHAZAM, he looks like a large tiger, but his true nature is unclear. He generally hangs around sleeping at Billy’s apartment, it’s known he is highly magical though it’s rare he shows it, he can speak and also transform into a house cat both of which he seems not to like doing. He often appears in Billy’s dreams as a humanoid Tiger in a white suit often with a drink in hand to give messages from the Wizard or other warnings.

Black Adam: The first Champion of SHAZAM in Egypt over 4,000 years ago. Much like Billy a pure hearted boy with very little Teth-Adam was corrupted by spending more and more time as Black Adam. Having lost his humanity he goes mad. SHAZAM is unable to take the Egyptian lighting from him and they war for many centuries till new gods, the Greeks, rise and SHAZAM can call forth a new champion who fights and seals Black Adam away but dies doing so. For close to 2,500 years Black Adam is sealed in an Egyptian grave till he’s unearthed in the 1920s. He becomes a problem for Golden then Sliver and on forward heroes, till he’s faced by a new modern Champion of SHAZAM who manages to force him to say “Shazam” Teth-Adam is reveled, a teenager the same age as Billy. Teth had been locked away in Black Adam’s mind for so long his return to humanity undoes a lot of the corruption and when he becomes Black Adam he is guilty and looking for ways to make up for what he did. Black Adam joins the JSA and while he tries to do good the corruption and the hard edges are still there and Billy keeps a close eye on him and tries to get him to let Theo (his new name) out more often sure that will do him good.

summary: Captain Marvel Sketch I’ve been reading a ton of Captain Marvel comics as of late. She is one badass woman. I might revisit this...
caption:
Captain Marvel Sketch

I’ve been reading a ton of Captain Marvel comics as of late. She is one badass woman. I might revisit this sketch later to finish it out. For now I’m just going to concentrate on getting back into the habit.

summary: Normally, I'm not one for Steve Rogers, but since I was feeling patriotic (post fourth of July obviously bc I think the holiday...
body:
Normally, I’m not one for Steve Rogers, but since I was feeling patriotic (post fourth of July obviously bc I think the holiday is insufferable) and decided to look into it.

AND LIKE, I THOUGHT STEVE FANFICTION WOULD BE. CUTE AND. INNOCENT BC THE MAN IS LITERALLY A 100 YEAR OLD VIRGIN, BUT UH, APPARENTLY NOT.

yall write some nasty shit, but so do i so lol

caption:
Words cannot describe how much I love Carol Danvers, even if Civil War 2 made her a dumbass, i am also a dumbass so its fine!

I hope her addition to the MCU goes smoothly ;-; I really want people to like her

Chewie is also an amazing space cat who needs more love

blog.name: marvelzombiespromos
blog.title: Marvel Zombies Promos
blog.description:
This is the promo page for Marvel Zombies RP. For more information, please visit our main page.

The characters advertised are not an exclusive list, rather they are a short list of suggestions. Our intention is to maintain a rotor of characters from a variety of backgrounds. Please feel free to apply outside of the characters posted here.

summary: Marvel Zombies RP Wanted Connection: Carol Danvers Requested by: Jessica Drew Telephone networks have failed, the internet is...
caption:
Marvel Zombies RP Wanted Connection: Carol Danvers
Requested by: Jessica Drew

Telephone networks have failed, the internet is gone. Modern communication seems to have come to an end. What remains is radiowaves. People with the right equipment have begun to communicate with anyone in range using CB radios, walkie talkies, whatever they can get their hands on. Some are broadcasting, some are just listening.

Carol slowly tuned through the channels on the old radio, she had crash landed on her reentry into the Earth’s atmosphere, and when she made it to Manhattan, the Tower was a wreckage. She heard the crackling sound of numbers coming through as she found an active channel –

This is Jessica Drew broadcasting for Carol Danvers. On the off chance you’re not in space and you’re out there, there’s somewhere safe. Haven. I’m here with Gerry. Clint is here. And Peter. Nat, Bobbi, Tony… I’ve saved you a room so you better get your ass here before someone steals it. Hope to see you soon! Love you, Kirk. Co-ordinates to follow…

Marvel Zombies RP is a Marvel Comics AU roleplay established 1 April 2017. We look forward to surviving with you.

Home || Plot || Rules || Taken/Open Characters || FAQ || Most Wanted

trail.content_raw:
Marvel Zombies RP Wanted Connection: Carol Danvers
Requested by: Jessica Drew

Telephone networks have failed, the internet is gone. Modern communication seems to have come to an end. What remains is radiowaves. People with the right equipment have begun to communicate with anyone in range using CB radios, walkie talkies, whatever they can get their hands on. Some are broadcasting, some are just listening.

Carol slowly tuned through the channels on the old radio, she had crash landed on her reentry into the Earth’s atmosphere, and when she made it to Manhattan, the Tower was a wreckage. She heard the crackling sound of numbers coming through as she found an active channel –

This is Jessica Drew broadcasting for Carol Danvers. On the off chance you’re not in space and you’re out there, there’s somewhere safe. Haven. I’m here with Gerry. Clint is here. And Peter. Nat, Bobbi, Tony… I’ve saved you a room so you better get your ass here before someone steals it. Hope to see you soon! Love you, Kirk. Co-ordinates to follow…

Marvel Zombies RP is a Marvel Comics AU roleplay established 1 April 2017. We look forward to surviving with you.

blog.name: philcoulsonismyhero
blog.title: I Believe in Heroes
blog.description:
23-year-old sci-fi nerd from Scotland. 
I read, I write, I watch, I draw, I spend inordinate amounts of time thinking about fandom-type things. And spaceships.
Also, I'm asexual, aromantic, agender, autistic, and of the opinion that everything is better with superheroes.
I've got too many fandoms, but I'm currently really into Voltron, Discworld and Captain Marvel

tags: have I mentioned recently that I Really Love carol danvers?
this is glaringly obvious to anyone who knows me irl because I have a captain marvel hoodie
that I've worn literally every day since I got it a few years ago
it's the most luridly brightly coloured item of clothing I've ever owned and I love it a lot
so yeah this is a heads up that i'll be getting Really Excited about any and all captain marvel movie news
carol is a Big Deal to me
summary: I finally saw Infinity War last week (nearly two months late, but who’s counting), so in celebration of the fact that I almost...
caption:
I finally saw Infinity War last week (nearly two months late, but who’s counting), so in celebration of the fact that I almost burst into tears when Carol’s logo finally appeared onscreen in an MCU movie, here’s a repost of the first two drawings I ever posted to tumblr!

These are from 2014 (when I was still teaching myself how to draw superheroes by copying art from my favourite comics) and the panels they’re imitating were in Captain Marvel (2012) issues drawn by Dexter Soy. I’m still really proud of them because they were one of my first attempts at drawing with proper markers.

Bonus: a Carol copied from the Avengers EMH tie-in comics, because that cartoon was my introduction to her as a character and I loved her immediately
